title: Trend Micro Deep Security Improper Access Control Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Trend Micro Deep Security. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Anti-Malware Solution Platform. The product applies insufficient access controls to a sensitive folder. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000296337
timeline:
2022-07-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-01-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
